title: cabbage rolls
directions: pkace cabbage in boiling water and remove leaves as they become limp
mix beef, rice, onion, salt, pepper and garlic
place small handful of mixure into a cabbage leaf and fold edges
line baking dish with extra cabbage leaves or sauerkraut
put cabbage rolls on top of lining and top with tomatoes
add tomato juice of necessry to cover
spread soour cream over them and bake for 5 minutes more
